mapper.select: select * from (select finfinfin.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY aname ORDER BY aname, amountsum) rnum from( select amountsum,star, ac.amainimg,ac.aname,ac.aaddress from ( select riid, sum(amount) amountsum from( select fin.* , case when peseason ='성수기' then ripeak when peseason ='준성수기' then risemipeak when peseason ='비수기' then rioff end as amount from (select a.*,dt.ds from ( select pr.pestart, pr.peend, pr.peseason, ri.riid, ri.ripeak, ri.risemipeak, ri.rioff from room_info ri left outer join (select ri.riid from review r, reservation re, room_info ri where r.rid=re.rid and re.riid=ri.riid group by ri.riid) cnt on ri.riid=cnt.riid left outer join accommodations ac on ac.aid=ri.aid left outer join period pr on pr.aid=ac.aid) a,date_t dt where ds >=#{rcheckin} and ds <=#{rcheckout}) fin where to_date(ds,'yy/mm/dd')>=pestart and to_date(ds,'yy/mm/dd')<=peend) group by riid) finfin, room_info ri, accommodations ac, ( select riid,star from ( (select ri.riid ,cnt.star star from room_info ri left outer join (select nvl(avg(r.restar),0) star,ri.riid from review r,reservation re, room_info ri where r.rid=re.rid and re.riid=ri.riid group by ri.riid) cnt on ri.riid=cnt.riid left outer join accommodations ac on ac.aid=ri.aid left outer join period pr on pr.aid=ac.aid)) group by riid,star) star where star.riid = ri.riid and ri.riid=finfin.riid and ac.aid = ri.aid and ac.aisdel is null and ri.riroom-(select count(rcheckin) from reservation where rcheckin <= #{rcheckin} and rcheckout >=#{rcheckout} and rcancel is null)>=#{countRoom} and ri.rimaxper>=#{rimaxper} and ri.riminper<=#{rimaxper} and (ac.aaddress like '%'||#{aaddress}||'%' or ac.aname like '%'||#{aname}||'%') ) finfinfin) where rnum = 1
